projects.title: AI Tool for Heuristic Evaluation
projects.description: Develop an AI-based heuristic evaluation tool capable of automatically assessing usability issues in digital interfaces, mimicking the analysis of an expert usability evaluator.

projects.title: AI-Driven NLP Engine for Usability Test Results Analysis
projects.description: Design and implement an NLP-based analysis engine that automatically processes qualitative usability test data, including open-ended answers, task observations, moderator notes, and transcripts.

projects.title: Unified Logging and Traceability System for Usability Studies
projects.description: Implement a structured logging and traceability system that records all relevant events during a usability study lifecycle.

projects.title: AI-Powered Accessibility Evaluation in RUXAILAB
projects.description: Develop a comprehensive AI-powered accessibility evaluation system within RUXAILAB, focusing on automating and enhancing WCAG compliance testing.

projects.title: AI Tool for Heuristic Evaluation
projects.description: Develop an AI-based heuristic evaluation tool capable of automatically assessing usability issues in digital interfaces, mimicking the analysis of an expert usability evaluator.

projects.title: Integration of Heat Maps into Remote Usability LAB
projects.description: Develop and integrate a comprehensive heatmap recording tool for usability testing inside the RUXAILAB framework, including scroll maps, click maps, and move maps.

projects.title: Integration of User Testing into RUXAILAB with Eye Tracking, Sentiment Analysis and Pre-Post Form Tasks
projects.description: Integrate advanced user testing capabilities into RUXAILAB, incorporating eye tracking, sentiment analysis, and structured pre/post-test forms.

projects.title: UI Layout Optimization for RUXAILAB
projects.description: Redesign the RUXAILAB user interface (UI) to improve usability, accessibility, and responsiveness.

projects.title: Comparative Analysis and Fine-Tuning of Sentiment Models for Improved System Integration
projects.description: Compare and fine-tune sentiment analysis models to enhance integration efficiency and scalability within RUXAILAB.

projects.title: Eye Tracking Algorithm Optimization
projects.description: Optimize existing eye tracking algorithms to improve their efficiency and accuracy, with real-time capabilities integrated with RUXAILAB project.

projects.title: Integration of heat maps into Remote Usability LAB
projects.description: Develop and integrate a tool that allows to record different heat maps including scroll maps, click maps, and move maps.

projects.title: Data Extraction for Sentiment Analysis from Usability Tests
projects.description: Develop tools and algorithms for extracting data from moderated and unmoderated usability tests specifically for sentiment analysis purposes using NLP techniques.

projects.title: Implementation of Card Sorting method on RUXAILAB
projects.description: Implement a novel usability analysis method based on card sorting, a research technique involving the categorization and organization of information through user collaboration.

projects.title: Refactor User Testing workflow and layout
projects.description: Development of a set of tools that will provide the foundations of an open source community that helps to develop the future of the usability LABs in remote environments.

projects.title: Integration of an eye tracking recognition system
projects.description: Research already existing eye tracking algorithms to see their boundaries and differences to keep up developing an own existing algorithm using js for a front-end system.

projects.title: Integration of heat maps into Remote Usability LAB
projects.description: Develop and integrate a tool that allows to record the different heat maps including scroll maps, click maps, and move maps.

projects.title: Scroll Maps
projects.description: Develop a scroll map tool that shows the exact percentage of people who scroll down to any point on the page.

projects.title: Click Maps
projects.description: Develop a click map tool that shows an aggregate of where visitors click their mouse on desktop devices and tap their finger on mobile devices.

projects.title: Virtual Reality app to virtual prototyping UI into VR
projects.description: Create a new method of prototyping Virtual Reality on VR - a tool that allows to prototype UI into VR.

projects.title: Implementation of an Open Source tool based on usability remote testing
projects.description: Development of a set of tools that will provide the foundations of an open source community that helps to develop the future of the usability LABs in remote environments.

projects.title: Continue development of an eye tracking recognition system
projects.description: Research already existing eye tracking algorithms to see their boundaries and differences to keep up developing an own existing algorithm using js for a front-end system.

projects.title: Face recognition system detection applied to the study of usability tests
projects.description: Develop a method to integrate sentimental analysis with the other different tools in order to create user journey maps that could provide more insights.

projects.title: UX applied to new user interfaces
projects.description: Find new heuristics methods that can be applied to new UI with the focus on voice user interfaces (VUI), VR and AR systems.

projects.title: Integration of heat maps into Remote Usability LAB
projects.description: Develop and integrate a tool that allows to record the different heat maps including scroll maps, click maps, and move maps.
